original_text: And straightway many were gathered together, insomuch that there was no room to receive them, no, not so much as about the door: and he preached the word unto them.
korean_text: 많은 사람이 모여서 문 앞까지도 들어설 자리가 없게 되었는데 예수께서 그들에게 도를 말씀하시더니

sentences.original_text: And straightway many were gathered together
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 즉시 많은 사람들이 모여 들었고

sentences.original_text: insomuch that there was no room to receive them
no, not so much as about the door
and he preached the word unto them
